sentences.sContent: In our freedom, we reject the colonial apartheid system that has caused genocide to our people, and to all Indigenous peoples.
sentences.sContent_eng: In our freedom, we reject the colonial apartheid system that has caused genocide to our people, and to all Indigenous peoples.
sentences.sCn: 以我们自由的名义, 我们拒绝这对我们人民, 和所有原住民造成种族灭绝的殖民隔离体系.

sentences.sContent: At the same time, the anti-colonial movements for independence in Asia, Africa and the Caribbean appropriated Lincoln as an exemplar of freedom and national unity.
sentences.sContent_eng: At the same time, the anti-colonial movements for independence in Asia, Africa and the Caribbean appropriated Lincoln as an exemplar of freedom and national unity.
sentences.sCn: 同时，追求独立的反殖民运动在亚洲、非洲和加勒比地区展开，这些运动都将林肯作为自由和国家统一的榜样。

words.tran: 殖民主义者的；奉行殖民主义的
殖民者；殖民地居民；移民
殖民者；殖民地开拓者；移入选民；移民
开拓殖民地；移居于殖民地
将…开拓为殖民地；移于殖民地；从他地非法把选民移入

trans.tranOther: someone who lives in a  colony  but who is a citizen of the country that rules the colony
relating to a country that controls and rules other countries, usually ones that are far away
